trans-unit.source: To secure your endpoints, you must restrict access to only authenticated clients.
trans-unit.target: To secure your endpoints, you must restrict access to only authenticated clients.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure Management portal, navigate to your mobile service, then click Data > your table name (TodoItem) > Permissions.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure Management portal, navigate to your mobile service, then click Data > your table name (TodoItem) > Permissions.

trans-unit.source: Set all of the table operation permissions to Only authenticated users.
trans-unit.target: Set all of the table operation permissions to Only authenticated users.

trans-unit.source: This ensures that all operations against the table require an authenticated user, which is required for this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: This ensures that all operations against the table require an authenticated user, which is required for this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: You can set differnt permissions on each operations to support your specific scenario.
trans-unit.target: You can set differnt permissions on each operations to support your specific scenario.
